original: / tena mohara- tyādimantram bījabhūtam tantropadeśāt pṛthivyādisvabhāvan nyased iti / tathā tri- vidharūpaviṣayādī- api rūpavajrādikam iti / eṣo mantropādānābhāvāt kathan nyāsa iti praṣṇaḥ / satyam mahāsādhane kṣitigarbbhādibhir ityādinā vyakto bhaviṣyatīty uttaram / idā- nīm akṣobhyānupraveśapū- rvvoktagāthādvayena saha sambandhaḥ / tato nyāsam ityādi / skandhādīnām yathā- kramam ityantan granthānupūrvvyā sarvvam vyākhyātam mayā/etena kāyamaṇḍa- lasampanno bhavatīty atiyogaḥ // // idānīm mahāyogan kathayitum āha/ mūrddhni madhyagatam ityādi / ādhipatyapra- yogata iti / smaraṇānantarataḥ / mūrddhni madhyagatañ candramaṇḍalan ta- dupari omkaran tasmāl locanām vividhā- ṅ kāyavajrañ ca cintayed iti sambandhaḥ / tanmadhya ityādi / vairocanavyūhama- dhye adhipatim ekam pradhānabhūtañ cinted iti sugamam/ buddhakāyadhara ityā- di / buddhās tryadhvavarttinas tathāgatāḥ / te- ṣāṁ kāyan tadātmakatayā dhārayatīti buddhakāyadharaḥ śrīr llocanā sā yasya vidyate / sa śrīmān.
analyzed: tena mohara tyādi mantram bīja bhūtam tantra upadeśāt nyaset iti tathā tri vidha rūpa viṣaya ādī api rūpa vajra ādikam iti eṣaḥ mantra upādāna abhāvāt katham nyāsaḥ iti satyam mahāsādhane madhya gatam ityādi ādhipatya pra yogataḥ iti smaraṇa anantarataḥ mūrddhni madhya gatan candra maṇḍalan tad upari tasmāt locanām kāya vajran ca cintayet iti sambandhaḥ tad madhye ityādi vairocana

original: / trivajro mahāvajradharas tenābhedyatvenaikātmyeṇa bhāvitaḥ / me mama kāye adhiṣṭhā- nena padam pratiṣṭhāṁ karotu / kāyavajriṇa iti / prathamaikavacanārthe vajravaca- nam ārṣatvāt./evam anyatrāpi ślokadvaye jñātavyam iti / daśadig ity anayā gāthayā samastavairocanavyūhasya prārthanā karttavyā bhāvakena / evam vakṣyamāṇavākcittayor api śeṣam pūrvvat.

original: / yogī sa vetti jānāti / grāhyagrāhakañ cetyādi / grā- hyam prabhāsvaram grāhakam apariśuddhamāyādeham / iti dvidhā dviprakārā buddhir nna vidyate no- tpadyate yatra jñāne abhinnatā bhāvet tad āha bravīti / śāśvatocchedabuddhī tv ityādi / śāśvato 'pariśuddhamāyādehaḥ / ucchedaḥ prabhāsvaraṁ (+prabhāsvaraṁ) prajñāka(+ka)ruṇayor aikyam ityādi / prajñā prabhāsvaram karuna pariśuddhamāyādehah / prajñopāyasamāpatye- ti / prājñā śūnyatā / upāyo māyādehaḥ / yatra so- padhiśeṣañ ca tathā nirūpadhiśeṣakam ityādi / sopadhiśeṣo māyādehaḥ / niru- padhiśeṣam nirvvāṇam / yatra pudgalanairātmyam ety apītyādi pudgalanairā- tmyam svādhiṣṭhānarūpaṁ / dharmmanairātmyaṇ prabhāsvaraṁ jñātvetyādi / yoginā padam avya[ya]m ityantam subodham su- ptaprabuddha ity etadavasthādvayavarjitam ityādi / suptāvasthā prabhāsvaram pra- buddhāvasthā māyādehaḥ / samādhānāsamādhānam ityā- di / samādhānaḥ prabhās varam / asamādhāno māyādehaḥ / asmṛtismṛtivinirmukta ityādi / asmṛtiḥ prabhāsvaram smṛtir māyārdehaḥ / rāgārāgavinirmukta ityā- di/rāgo māyādehaḥ / a- rāgaḥ prabhāsvaraṁ / kāryakāraṇañ cetyādi / kāryaṁ prabhāsvaraṁ kāraṇam mā- yādehaḥ/utpattikrama eko [']yam ityādi gangāyāḥ siktopamā ityantamadhye- ṣu samvṛtisatyābhidhāyakapadam asti pa- ramārthasatyābhidhāyakapadañ cānayor aikyam jñātvā yuganaddharüpasyoktakra- meṇa paryāyaghoṣaṇā karttavyā vijñena //
analyzed: yogī sa vetti jānāti grāhya grāhakam ca ityādi grā hyam prabhāsvaram grāhakam apariśuddha māyā deham iti dvidhā dvi prakārā buddhiḥ vidyate no tpadyate yatra jñāne abhinna tā tat āha nirvvāṇam yatra pudgala nairātmyam api ityādi pudgala nairātmyam api ityādi pudgala nairātmyam prabhāsvara jñātvā ityādi yoginā padam ityantam su bodham iti etat avasthā dvaya varjitam ityādi supta kāraṇam utpatti kramaḥ ekaḥ yam ityādi gangāyāḥ sikta upamā iti anta madhye su samvṛti satya abhidhāyaka padam asti ca anayoḥ aikyam jñātvā paryāya ghoṣaṇā karttavyā vijñena
